main.welcomeText: We build modern and responsive websites tailored to your needs.
main.aboutText: Amarire Dev is a web development studio dedicated to building fast, beautiful, and functional websites.
hero_description: I am a passionate front-end web developer specializing in creating responsive, user-friendly websites with modern technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I strive to deliver seamless digital experiences that meet client needs and exceed expectations.
about_paragraph_1: I develop websites with a strong focus on creating designs that are both visually appealing and highly functional. My approach involves understanding the unique goals and requirements of each client to deliver digital solutions that truly reflect their vision. Throughout my experience, I have worked on a wide range of projects including eCommerce stores, blogs, business websites, and personal portfolios. Each project is treated with the same level of care to ensure that the final product not only looks good but also offers seamless navigation and a satisfying user experience across all devices and browsers.
about_paragraph_2: In building websites, I employ a variety of tools and technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and popular platforms like WordPress, WooCommerce, and Shopify. These tools allow me to manage both the frontend interfaces that users interact with and the backend systems that keep everything running smoothly. The code I write is structured, clean, and maintainable, making it easier to update and expand websites over time to meet changing needs. By focusing on performance, security, and compatibility, I aim to deliver reliable and efficient websites that provide visitors with a seamless and uninterrupted experience.
about_paragraph_3: Maintaining open and clear communication with clients is a key part of my workflow. I make sure to collaborate closely during every phase of a project, from initial planning to final delivery, and even after the site goes live. This ongoing support allows for continuous improvements, updates, and adjustments that help keep the website relevant and effective. Additionally, I dedicate time to learning new trends and technologies in web development, which enables me to incorporate the latest advancements and best practices into my work. The ultimate goal is to help clients establish a strong and professional online presence that supports their ambitions and grows alongside their business.

testimonials.title: What My Clients Say
testimonials.text1: It was great working with Amarire. He understood exactly what I needed and delivered everything on time. The result was clean and professional.
testimonials.text2: I’m really happy with the website Amarire built for my project. It looks great and works smoothly. Communication was easy and clear throughout.
testimonials.text3: Very reliable and responsive. Even when I needed small changes, he was quick to handle them. Definitely recommend if you're looking for quality work.
testimonials.text4: Simple process, great result. I had no technical knowledge, but Amarire guided me step by step. I now have a site I’m proud to share with clients.
